name: list_documents
description: List all documents with their titles and access levels.

name: publish_document
description: Publish the content of a specified document by ID.

document_id.description: The ID of the document to access.

name: list_patent_files
description: List all available patent files with their last modified date.

name: download_document
description: Download a document using its ID.

document_id.description: ID of the document to be downloaded.
